quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
author: Bobby Unser

quote: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.
author: Heywood Broun

quote: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.
author: Robert Griffin III

quote: Sports teaches you character, it teaches you to play by the rules, it teaches you to know what it feels like to win and lose-it teaches you about life.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.
author: Bob Feller

quote: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
author: Ferdinand Porsche

quote: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: You can't win unless you learn how to lose.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: Sports teaches you to understand the meaning of a team. You need to be able to work with everybody; you don't have to be their best friend. You can experience the fun of competition and driving toward a common goal without pushing to bond in some major way with each individual on a project.
author: Kathleen Kennedy

quote: It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
author: Dan Gable

quote: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
author: Mario Lopez

quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. It's been the site of intense pain and the most intense feelings of joy and satisfaction. It's a relationship that has evolved over time, given me the greatest respect and love for the game.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Winning is habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: A good vacation for me is going to warm weather. Being able to go outside, in the sun, hit the beach, play outside sports. Being active outside. Going swimming, hanging by the pool, having a couple drinks, having a couple of your close buddies around, and just having a blast.
author: Rob Gronkowski

quote: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.
author: Mike Singletary

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: My motto was always to keep swinging. Whether I was in a slump or feeling badly or having trouble off the field, the only thing to do was keep swinging.
author: Hank Aaron

quote: There are only two seasons - winter and Baseball.
author: Bill Veeck

quote: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: It is not up to me whether I win or lose. Ultimately, this might not be my day. And it is that philosophy towards sports, something that I really truly live by. I am emotional. I want to win. I am hungry. I am a competitor. I have that fire. But deep down, I truly enjoy the art of competing so much more than the result.
author: Apolo Ohno

quote: I am building a fire, and everyday I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.
author: Casey Stengel

quote: Band members have a special bond. A great band is more than just some people working together. It's like a highly specialized army unit, or a winning sports team. A unique combination of elements that becomes stronger together than apart.
author: Steven Van Zandt

quote: When the going gets weird, the weird turn pro.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: It's good sportsmanship to not pick up lost golf balls while they are still rolling.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Sports are such a great teacher. I think of everything they've taught me: camaraderie, humility, how to resolve differences.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: People ask me what I do in winter when there's no baseball. I'll tell you what I do. I stare out the window and wait for spring.
author: Rogers Hornsby

quote: To me, it doesn't matter how good you are. Sport is all about playing and competing. Whatever you do in cricket and in sport, enjoy it, be positive and try to win.
author: Ian Botham

quote: In sports, you simply aren't considered a real champion until you have defended your title successfully. Winning it once can be a fluke; winning it twice proves you are the best.
author: Althea Gibson

quote: February is always a bad month for TV sports. Football is gone, basketball is plodding along in the annual midseason doldrums, and baseball is not even mentioned.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: The best kids are going to become the best. But the best thing about it is that you're going to learn lessons in playing those sports about winning and losing and teamwork and teammates and arguments and everything else that are going to affect you positively for the rest of your life.
author: Carl Lewis

quote: Skiing combines outdoor fun with knocking down trees with your face.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Tennis is a perfect combination of violent action taking place in an atmosphere of total tranquillity.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: We didn't lose the game; we just ran out of time.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: You know how sports teach kids teamwork and how to be strong and brave and confident? Improv was my sport. I learned how to not waffle and how to hold a conversation, how to take risks and actually be excited to fail.
author: Emma Stone

quote: Fishing is much more than fish. It is the great occasion when we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than a hundred teaching it.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: You always get a special kick on opening day, no matter how many you go through. You look forward to it like a birthday party when you're a kid. You think something wonderful is going to happen.
author: Joe DiMaggio

quote: Just be patient. Let the game come to you. Don't rush. Be quick, but don't hurry.
author: Earl Monroe

quote: Gray skies are just clouds passing over.
author: Frank Gifford

quote: That's one thing you learn in sports. You don't give up; you fight to the finish.
author: Louis Zamperini

quote: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: Hockey is a sport for white men. Basketball is a sport for black men. Golf is a sport for white men dressed like black pimps.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: If it doesn't matter who wins or loses, then why do they keep score?
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: People love video games because they do things they obviously can't do in real life. That's especially true with sports games because fans love to step into the shoes of their favorite athletes.
author: Ralph Baer

quote: Life wasn't easy growing up; it was frustrating. If I had been a better reader, then that would have come easily, sports would have come easily, everything would have come easily, and I never would have realized that the way you get ahead in life is hard work.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: We are raising today's children in sterile, risk-averse and highly structured environments. In so doing, we are failing to cultivate artists, pioneers and entrepreneurs, and instead cultivating a generation of children who can follow the rules in organized sports games, sit for hours in front of screens and mark bubbles on standardized tests.
author: Darell Hammond

quote: Sports play a very important role in consolidating the national strength, adding lustre to the country's prestige and honour, inspiring people with national dignity and pride, and imbuing the whole society with revolutionary mettle.
author: Kim Jong-un

quote: I think what endurance sports teach you is to stay dedicated, stay focused, and also to understand you're going to have ups and downs, but you need to keep running right through them.
author: Kyrsten Sinema

quote: Sports have always been a big part of my life. At school, I played a lot of different sports, and I was competing with other schools. I did everything: running, volleyball, basketball, soccer, Olympic-style gymnastics, and more! My history with sports gave me good concentration, focus, strength, and motivation to stay healthy.
author: Izabel Goulart

quote: To find a man's true character, play golf with him.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: I'm riveted by extreme sports like big-wave surfing, 'megaramp' skateboarding and half-pipe snowboarding. I'm fascinated partly because the sports are so exhilaratingly acrobatic. But I'm also captivated by the fear that a terrible accident might happen at any moment. And accidents do happen.
author: Lucy Walker

quote: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.
author: Donald Johanson

quote: At school I pretended I had a normal life, but I felt lonely all the time and different from everyone else. I never felt like I fit in, and I wasn't allowed to participate in after-school activities, go to sports events or parties or date boys. Many times I had to make up stories about why I couldn't do anything with my classmates.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: That's the biggest gap in sports, the difference between the winner and the loser of the Super Bowl.
author: John Madden

quote: I see great things in baseball. It's our game - the American game.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The Olympic Games are always in the head of every sports athlete. We work for that. The Olympics are the most important race. They're each four years, and everybody wants to show their best performance.
author: Tina Maze

quote: I went to a fight the other night, and a hockey game broke out.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: I have long understood that losing always comes with the territory when you wander into the gambling business, just as getting crippled for life is an acceptable risk in the linebacker business. They both are extremely violent sports, and pain is part of the bargain. Buy the ticket, take the ride.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Sports should not become routine. It should be about passion.
author: Kapil Dev

quote: We live in a world where sports have the potential to bridge the gap between racism, sexism and discrimination. The 2012 Olympic Games was a great start but hopefully what these games taught us is that if women are given an opportunity on an equal playing field the possibilities for women are endless.
author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quote: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
author: Ted Williams

quote: Swimming is probably the ultimate of burnout sports. It's ironic because millions of people who swim as their regular exercise love the meditation aspect of it; you don't wind up with any orthopedic injuries. But when you swim at a world class level for hours and hours - the loneness of the long distance runner.
author: Diana Nyad

quote: I'm tired of hearing about money, money, money, money, money. I just want to play the game, drink Pepsi, wear Reebok.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: Being nerdy just means being passionate about something, including everyone - the coolest people on Earth are passionate and therefore nerdy about something whatever it is, whether it's sports, or gaming, or technology, or fashion, or beauty, or food, or whatever.
author: Zachary Levi

quote: Every child should have time for arts, music, sports, drama, robotics, school newspapers and the like, not to mention recess and play.
author: Chris Gabrieli

quote: Wrestling is ballet with violence.
author: Jesse Ventura

quote: Thanks to the competence, love of God, our country's security and stability, endowed wealth, integrated infrastructure and quality services, the U.A.E. turned into the world's renowned destination for tourism, investment and business management: the interface of choice for hosting major cultural events, artistic and sports, in the world.
author: Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan

quote: But sports carried me away from being in a gang, or being associated with drugs. Sports was my way out.
author: LeBron James

quote: I think the Winter Olympics are definitely on a smaller scale than the summer games, but with the inclusion of cool new sports like slope style skiing and snowboarding, it is going to breathe new life into them and attract a whole new crowd.
author: Nick Goepper

quote: Sports is a metaphor for overcoming obstacles and achieving against great odds. Athletes, in times of difficulty, can be important role models.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: Sports is the common denominator in the world that brings everyone together. If there's any one place in the world where there is equality, it is probably sports. That was something that didn't always exist. We've come a long way in sports. Why can't society use sports as a way to bring people together and create change?
author: Stephen M. Ross

quote: Apart from education, you need good health, and for that, you need to play sports.
author: Kapil Dev

quote: I wish I had played team sports. I think every kid should. Teamwork builds character - teaches people about leadership and cooperation.
author: Mo Rocca

quote: The two most important things in life are good friends and a strong bullpen.
author: Bob Lemon

quote: Sailing a boat calls for quick action, a blending of feeling with the wind and water as well as with the very heart and soul of the boat itself. Sailing teaches alertness and courage, and gives in return a joyousness and peace that but few sports afford.
author: George Matthew Adams

quote: I won't predict anything historic. But nothing is impossible.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: I'm one of these people that likes adrenaline and new things, like extreme sports. It makes me feel alive.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: It doesn't matter whether you are pursuing success in business, sports, the arts, or life in general: The bridge between wishing and accomplishing is discipline.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: As a father, I believe that involving children in sports at a young age is generally, a wise proposition. I believe that healthy competition is... well... healthy; that sporting events foster a spirit of teamwork that far surpasses the events themselves; and that active participation keeps children moving and is good for their self-esteem.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: You win some, lose some, and wreck some.
author: Dale Earnhardt

quote: The Internet is changing what entertainment and sports is. It's not just a few people authoring an experience for others. It's really growing out of what everybody does.
author: Gabe Newell

quote: You prevent kids from joining gangs by offering after-school programs, sports, mentoring, and positive engagement with adults. You intervene with gang members by offering alternatives and employment to help redirect their lives. You deal with areas of high gang crime activity with real community policing. We know what works.
author: Greg Boyle

quote: If you watch a game, it's fun. If you play it, it's recreation. If you work at it, it's golf.
author: Bob Hope

quote: I like sports, and swimming is my favorite. Doing physical exercises keeps one fit and healthy and helps one work more efficiently. I think we all need to strike a balance between work and relaxation. This can keep us energetic and help us do our job better.
author: Xi Jinping

quote: I am in the fighting game. I don't care about anything else. I don't watch the news, I don't care about politics, I don't care about other sports. I don't care about anything I don't need to care about. This is my sport: it is my life. I study it; I think about it all the time. Nothing else matters.
author: Conor McGregor

quote: Show me a good loser, and I'll show you a loser.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: What other people may find in poetry or art museums, I find in the flight of a good drive.
author: Arnold Palmer

quote: If you look at all aspects of all sports, everything comes down to basics and fundamentals.
author: Robbie Lawler

quote: Serious sport has nothing to do with fair play. It is bound up with hatred, jealousy, boastfulness, disregard of all rules and sadistic pleasure in witnessing violence. In other words, it is war minus the shooting.
author: George Orwell

quote: Golf is a day spent in a round of strenuous idleness.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Science has taught us, against all intuition, that apparently solid things like crystals and rocks are really almost entirely composed of empty space. And the familiar illustration is the nucleus of an atom is a fly in the middle of a sports stadium, and the next atom is in the next sports stadium.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Life is about timing.
author: Carl Lewis

quote: Ethnic prejudice has no place in sports, and baseball must recognize that truth if it is to maintain stature as a national game.
author: Branch Rickey

quote: Several professional athletes have wrongly taught many young Americans by example that the only way to succeed in sports is to take steroids.
author: Jim Sensenbrenner

quote: Honestly, I don't listen to nobody else's music but my own. It's kind of like sports to me. You don't see Kobe Bryant at a LeBron James game - he just works on his own game. And that's what I do. I only listen to me, so I can criticize and analyze and all those things.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: There is a syndrome in sports called 'paralysis by analysis.'
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: From Enve Composites to Bluehouse Skis, Utah companies are making breakthrough products for biking, winter sports, water sports and more.
author: Gary Herbert

quote: Lake Pend Oreille is definitely my favorite place to be while in Sandpoint. I love to get out on a boat to enjoy water sports, camping, fishing, or just to relax and catch a sunset.
author: Nate Holland

quote: I happened to be in a position in Superior where I could play three sports, and when I came to Minnesota, I had the understanding they would allow me to play three sports. Kids now don't have the same amount of time. You have coaches that think baseball is 10 months a year. Hockey is 11 or 12 months a year.
author: Bud Grant

quote: We've just got to be careful - with all sports, let alone cricket - I think there's so much emphasis on doing the right thing all the time, but I think the public want to be entertained when they come to watch sport.
author: Shane Warne

quote: Despite the amazing diversity we're blessed with in this country, schools are still in large part segregated because of economic disparity. Sports are one of the few areas where kids are really given the opportunity to interact with those of different races and religions.
author: Steve Kerr

quote: Baseball happens to be a game of cumulative tension but football, basketball and hockey are played with hand grenades and machine guns.
author: John Leonard

quote: I love outdoor sports, like volleyball, and I play them whenever I can.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: Baseball players are smarter than football players. How often do you see a baseball team penalized for too many men on the field?
author: Jim Bouton

quote: Golf is a game in which you yell 'fore,' shoot six, and write down five.
author: Paul Harvey

quote: In sports and in business, the greatest leaders are those who make the best decisions in the most crucial of situations. They are the ones who focus their energy on turning tough decisions into winning decisions.
author: Don Yaeger

quote: Thank you for reminding Canada that I'm a disappointment to them. I like hockey, I love it, but I'm not an avid hockey - let's face it, true Canadian - fan. I've always been more into snowboarding and skateboarding and sort of the alternative sports, I'm not crazy about hockey - but love it!
author: Dustin Milligan

quote: I live by 'Go big or go home.' That's with everything. It's like either commit and go for it or don't do it at all. I apply that to everything. I apply that to relationships, I apply that to like sports, I apply that to everything. That's what I live by. That's how I like it.
author: Paul Walker

quote: I want to rip out his heart and feed it to Lennox Lewis. I want to kill people. I want to rip their stomachs out and eat their children.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: If I wasn't dyslexic, I probably wouldn't have won the Games. If I had been a better reader, then that would have come easily, sports would have come easily... and I never would have realized that the way you get ahead in life is hard work.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: Bowling is all physics and energy distribution. It's F = ma. So it is actually one of the most science-y sports, because it literally is just a ball and a surface and objects to knock down.
author: Chris Hardwick

quote: I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I am good at everything.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: I guess there is nothing that will get your mind off everything like golf. I have never been depressed enough to take up the game, but they say you get so sore at yourself you forget to hate your enemies.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Everyone thought I was going to die like a year later, they didn't know. So I helped educate sports, and then the world, that a man living with HIV can play basketball. He's not going to give it to anybody by playing basketball.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: If you look at things that really affect people's lives - sport, the arts, charities - they were always at the back of the queue for government money - health, social security, defence, pensions were all way ahead. And each of those areas - sports, the arts, the lottery - got relatively petty cash from the government.
author: John Major

quote: I have never cared especially for outdoor sports and have no desire to excel at tennis, swimming, or golf. I'll leave those things to the men.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Women's sports is still in its infancy. The beginning of women's sports in the United States started in 1972, with the passage of Title 9 for girls to finally get athletic scholarships.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: I never use the word 'hero' in sports. Hero is way above 'star.' I save 'star' for sports. Sports is entertainment; that's all it is.
author: Bud Grant

quote: Minor sports in the community is fun and recreation for everyone, not just the elite. I think back to my days in minor hockey and those are my fondest memories, having fun.
author: Bobby Orr

quote: You spend a good piece of your life gripping a baseball and in the end it turns out that it was the other way around all the time.
author: Jim Bouton

quote: One afternoon when I was 9, my dad told me I'd be skipping school the next day. Then we drove 12 hours from Melbourne to Sydney for the Centenary Test, a once-in-a-lifetime commemorative cricket match. It was great fun - especially for a kid who was a massive sports fan.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: I have always thought you could take the measure of a man by his sports manners - that is to say, the way in which he conducts himself on the playing field, or even over a game of chess or cards.
author: Graydon Carter

quote: Like great teams in sports and business endeavors, if there's a chemistry among the participants, and they truly enjoy fellowship together, everybody wants to be there, stay involved, and just have fun together.
author: Ed Greenwood

quote: Don't sell yourself short because without that you can't go far in life because after sports the only thing you know is sports and you can't do anything else with that.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: In the field of sports you are more or less accepted for what you do rather than what you are.
author: Althea Gibson

quote: I love eating it - grilled chicken, pasta, rice, and other foods that give me long term energy. Every once in a while, my sweet tooth gets the best of me and I have to snack on some candy. Beverage wise, I stick to sports drinks, water, milk, and juice.
author: Derrick Rose

quote: Growing up, I looked up to major league baseball players, and now these young women have amazing, incredible women all across the board, from swimming to gymnastics to softball to basketball. It is incredible how far women have come and women in sports have come.
author: Jennie Finch

quote: If I ever have downtime, I'm usually sitting in my place playing video games. Or eating sandwiches somewhere, or watching sports some place.
author: Hannibal Buress

quote: Growing up in Huntington Beach, you were either a traditional sports athlete, a skateboarder, or a surfer. I got my first skateboard when I was five and skated off and on over the years, did a little BMX racing as a kid, and then in my freshman or sophomore year I started getting a little bit more into skateboarding.
author: Jason Lee

quote: In the seventies we had to make it acceptable for people to accept girls and women as athletes. We had to make it okay for them to be active. Those were much scarier times for females in sports.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Sometimes in football you have to score goals.
author: Thierry Henry

quote: You don't suffer, kill yourself and take the risks I take just for money. I love bike racing.
author: Greg LeMond

quote: I'm a huge fan of Chicago sports and Chicago food, and I love going home and my family is still there. I guess it's pretty easy to have a normal life in Chicago.
author: Matt Walsh

quote: He's going to be around a long, long time, if his body holds up. That's always a concern with a lot of players because of how much they play. A lot of guys can't handle it. But it looks like he can.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: I'm the kind of guy who comes home and checks scores for everything. I'm a sports fan in general, so I pretty much keep up with who's ahead in a division and everything that's going on.
author: Chadwick Boseman

quote: I know, in India, specially in Bollywood and the sports fraternity, there is a lot of negative media attention on prominent public figures.
author: Leander Paes

quote: A lifetime of training for just ten seconds.
author: Jesse Owens

quote: You wouldn't have won if we'd beaten you.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: I know I am getting better at golf because I am hitting fewer spectators.
author: Gerald R. Ford

quote: Football is a simple game. Twenty-two men chase a ball for 90 minutes and at the end, the Germans always win.
author: Gary Lineker

quote: The only time my prayers are never answered is on the golf course.
author: Billy Graham

quote: The problem with winter sports is that - follow me closely here - they generally take place in winter.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Sportsmanship is definitely an important thing in all sports. In soccer, we all respect each other on such a high level, between Sweden and Brazil and Japan or whatever team it is.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: Golf is a game in which one endeavors to control a ball with implements ill adapted for the purpose.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Sports teaches you there is always a second innings in life. If you fail today, there's a second innings maybe two days later. Maybe there's another opportunity coming up three or six months later. If you look at mistake as learnings and commit never to make a same mistake again, then you actually get better with every mistake that you make.
author: Harsha Bhogle

quote: At home I have a copy of the April 21, 1986, issue of 'Sports Illustrated.' I'm on the cover with the blurb, 'Can Lou Do It?' I'd just arrived at Notre Dame, and with spring football underway, I was the focal point of that week's coverage.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Some people are born on third base and go through life thinking they hit a triple.
author: Barry Switzer

quote: The key to any good sports story is identifying the defining moment. In football games or a boxing match, it's usually pretty obvious. But in golf, sometimes it happens on Thursday. Usually it's Sunday, but guys who don't know the game, they can miss it.
author: Dan Jenkins

quote: I believe God created sports for a good reason. It's recreation. It's something that we enjoy. It teaches us a lot as well... I believe God is a sports fan.
author: Luke Scott

quote: If you think it's hard to meet new people, try picking up the wrong golf ball.
author: Jack Lemmon

quote: I wanted to use sports for social change.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: The ban on sports betting does exactly what Prohibition did. It makes criminals rich.
author: James Surowiecki

quote: People forget that track and field is one of the hardest sports because we compete against all the world. There are many sports when you are up against only 15 or 20 countries.
author: Greg Rutherford

quote: One of the most basic factors in sports is that winning becomes a habit, and losing is the same way. When failure starts to feel normal in your life or your work or even your darkest vices, you won't have to go looking for trouble, because trouble will find you. Count on it.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: How does one control weight? By not overeating. How does one stay in shape? One plays sports. There are no magic pills here.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
author: William James

quote: I grew up on the East Coast, and we always used to say, 'Go get your hustle on,' whether it was playing sports or making money. You do what you have to do to do what you want to do.
author: Antoine Fuqua

quote: I think that in any group activity - whether it be business, sports, or family - there has to be leadership or it won't be successful.
author: John Wooden

quote: It's hard to create new friendships outside sports.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: I've gotten to know a lot of great people here in all the different sports. It's fun. It's fun to get involved where you live. And this is where I live. I'm a registered voter here. I have my Wisconsin driver's license.
author: Aaron Rodgers

quote: Football is only once a week. NASCAR is once a week. Those sports are insanely popular. Horse racing is oversaturated. Unless tracks cut back to three days a week of full fields, a lot of people will really hurt down the road. Horse racing, to survive, has to go to that. Let's face it: Churchill Downs only does well on Derby Week.
author: Rick Pitino

quote: Good ideas are like Nike sports shoes. They may facilitate success for an athlete who possesses them, but on their own they are nothing but an overpriced pair of sneakers. Sports shoes don't win races. Athletes do.
author: Felix Dennis

quote: Bulls do not win bull fights. People do.
author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quote: Sports nurtures dreams of achieving self confidence and masculine striving for the skinny kid watching a boxer dance around the ring with sublime ease.
author: Armstrong Williams

quote: Hitting is timing. Pitching is upsetting timing.
author: Warren Spahn

quote: Politics should not interfere with sports. And sports should impact politics.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: It's a crazy world, so sports and athletics and music can be a form of escapism.
author: Eddie Vedder

quote: It was actually drumming that gave me the stamina to get into sports later. I started playing drums at 13, and when I got to the international touring level... I got interested in cross-country skiing, long-distance swimming, bicycling... things that require stamina, not finesse.
author: Neil Peart

quote: After one Olympics, if we invest in sports and say we will get a gold medal in the next Olympic, it doesn't work like that in sports. How it works is that you provide the infrastructure, provide education about nutrition and health.
author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quote: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks. This is the inner beauty of sports and competition, and it can serve us all well as adult athletes.
author: Peggy Fleming

quote: It is hard to compete with other sports. Badminton is a sport which, when compared with football and tennis, still needs promotion.
author: Lin Dan

quote: Extreme sports tricks are becoming increasingly complex, the courses ever more challenging and crashes all too common.
author: Lucy Walker

quote: One of the biggest gaps in sports is the difference between the winning and losing teams of the Super Bowl. They don't invite the losing team to the White House. They don't have parades for them. They don't throw confetti on them.
author: John Madden

quote: Sports have become increasingly more specialized, but that doesn't mean they shouldn't be fun.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: Sports and entertainment are the only places where inner-city kids see themselves being able to succeed. Their intellectual development is something they don't relate to.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: If you meet the Buddha in the lane, feed him the ball.
author: Phil Jackson

quote: Some boys accepted me, some didn't. And my family had comments made to them. Brazil is still a very macho society, and sports are mainly for boys, so people would say to them: 'What is this girl doing? Why is she always out there in the soccer games with the boys?'
author: Marta

quote: I also developed an interest in sports, and played in informal games at a nearby school yard where the neighborhood children met to play touch football, baseball, basketball and occasionally, ice hockey.
author: Steven Chu

quote: Soccer and cricket were my main sports growing up. I had trials as a soccer player with a few clubs interested, Crystal Palace being one, but it was cricket which became my chosen profession.
author: Ian Botham

quote: Linguistics is a good way of defining the culture of a brand. The vocabulary used by sports and lifestyle brands - running, fitness, training, motorsports - is all about functionality, whereas the vocabulary of the luxury business - handbags, ready-to-wear - is all about the product.
author: Francois-Henri Pinault

quote: Give me golf clubs, fresh air and a beautiful partner, and you can keep the clubs and the fresh air.
author: Jack Benny

quote: I played basketball, baseball, and football. I never had much downtime. But I think playing multiple sports helped tremendously in my baseball career. I have the agility of all three combined into one.
author: Giancarlo Stanton

quote: Maybe because I am from a sports background, I don't give up easily. I am a fighter.
author: Deepika Padukone

quote: Pitching is the art of instilling fear.
author: Sandy Koufax

quote: Sports have always been a really important part of how I energize myself, as well as how I relax. I spend a lot of my spare time with my family playing tennis, biking and rollerblading.
author: Irene Rosenfeld

quote: The world of extreme sports is also one of big business. Kids might think that snowboarding is the ultimate freedom, but this freedom is being marketed to them by commercial sponsors.
author: Lucy Walker

quote: The two most important things in my life were academics and sports. I had to do my schoolwork first.
author: Gabriel Luna

quote: For me, sports is a big part of my life. It helped me through high school. It helped me get better grades, because if you don't have good grades, you can't play sports.
author: David Charvet

quote: God made me fast. And when I run, I feel His pleasure.
author: Eric Liddell

quote: I look at athletes in all sports and try to picture what kind of football player they'd be, what position they'd play and so on.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Don't force your kids into sports. I never was. To this day, my dad has never asked me to go play golf. I ask him. It's the child's desire to play that matters, not the parent's desire to have the child play. Fun. Keep it fun.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: When they take surveys of women in business, of the Fortune 500, the successful women, 80% of them, say they were in sports as a young woman.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: I like Barack Obama as a person. He's articulate, he knows sports, his brother-in-law's a coach. He always has the athletes to the White House. But I don't know about some of his policies and some of these people in Congress.
author: Pete Rose

quote: If you're a sports fan you realize that when you meet somebody, like a girlfriend, they kind of have to root for your team. They don't have a choice.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: Through the years I have received my share of recognition for efforts in the fields of sports, the arts, the struggle for full citizenship for the Negro people, labor's rights and the fight for peace.
author: Paul Robeson

quote: Obviously, signing on with Puma right when I turned pro, it's been a great fit for me to show off my colorful lifestyle as far as where I grew up and how I grew up, growing up on a public driving range and growing up around action sports my whole life. Not exactly the normal road that guys take to get to the PGA Tour.
author: Rickie Fowler

quote: On television, I have watched countless athletes from different countries, sports and Olympics stand proudly at the top of the podium and shed tears. They symbolized the Olympics for me because Olympic medals represent all of the hard work and sacrifices made by the athletes as well as the people who helped them reach the top of their sports.
author: Hannah Kearney

quote: Baseball is almost the only orderly thing in a very unorderly world. If you get three strikes, even the best lawyer in the world can't get you off.
author: Bill Veeck

quote: I'm about 5' 10", and my hair is the length of my whole body now. We grow our hair because of faith, but it's getting heavy. Most of the rastas I know with hair my length are elders, and they keep it tied up, but for a young person who's active and running around, the weight is a big thing. So to play sports, I put it in a backpack.
author: Damian Marley

quote: When I was a kid, I did many sports. Judo, like my dad, but also volleyball, handball, and gymnastics. We never played much football.
author: Robert Lewandowski

quote: When I was little, I guess I was just an ordinary kid. But then things changed when I was in junior high. You know, kids that become geeks become one because of something. Like, they aren't good at sports, or girls don't like them. I, too, for some reason, got into things like science fiction and, well, especially science fiction as an escape.
author: Takashi Murakami

quote: To me, acting used to be just, 'Get my face out there, get girls, make a little bit of money, make my mom proud.' It was just like sports. But there were moments in 'Moonlight' that I really felt like I had to know why he is the way he is. Or just people in general - why this person walks around with a frown on their face instead of a smile.
author: Trevante Rhodes

quote: Nobody's a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better. It's hard to stay on top.
author: Paul Coffey

quote: Sports betting is all about money management, so the most money won on one event is not the most important thing.
author: Bruce Dern

quote: I wasn't really a work-conscious type of person. I was a player. I loved to play sports.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I did some sports. It was a bit frustrating. I wasn't the greatest sports person.
author: Tim Burton

quote: My work ethic is from sports.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: I was always a sports nut but I've lost interest now in whether one bunch of mercenaries in north London is going to beat another bunch of mercenaries from west London.
author: John Cleese

quote: I like a few vintage Rolexes, and Panerais are good. I'm not into sports watches - I like chronometers.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I've always been a reserved cat. When I play sports, there's people used to get mad at me because I didn't hang out and things like that. I've never been that kind of person. Nothing has changed in that regard. I've never been posse, and all that. I'm a quiet storm.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: The idea of growing up in the South and being a man is an interesting thing; there's a lot masculinity involved, with hunting, fishing, and playing sports that rural people take pride in, but at the same time, I grew up really not wanting to hate anybody.
author: Jason Isbell

quote: The most successful achievers in sports are people that are really driven and have that spirit of hunger.
author: Rei Kawakubo

quote: Team sports are very important for shaping personalities. It's important that kids understand the mentality behind playing team sports and playing for one another and playing with friends.
author: Brian O'Driscoll

quote: In the United States, we spend millions of dollars on sports because it promotes teamwork, discipline, and the experience of learning to make great progress in small increments. Learning to play music does all this and more.
author: Linda Ronstadt

quote: In sports teams, apart from talk of sporting prowess and the imparting of inspirational thought, an extraordinary amount of time is spent discussing, and flaunting, material possessions.
author: Harsha Bhogle

quote: As parents, we need to send our kids back to 'old-fashioned' outdoor summer camps, which have been on the decline as the demand for sports and academics-based camps has risen. We need to fight budget cuts to public parks programs and resist closures of public swimming pools and playgrounds.
author: Darell Hammond

quote: I definitely try to live my life in a very fearless manner, but there are no other sports that you jump from a three-story building and land on your hands! Diving is a lot like life. You just have to trust in what you know and allow it to happen.
author: Keshia Knight Pulliam

quote: Every bit of knowledge we have demonstrates that there is a complete correlation between playing sports and success and potential for success. Playing sports is good for you physically, mentally, spiritually, psychologically.
author: John Skipper

quote: Some of the authorities would like to remove rhythmic gymnastics from the list of Olympic sports and turn it into art. I think this would be wrong, as rhythmic gymnastics is a true sport - we train around six hours per day and sometimes spend entire days in the gym.
author: Yana Kudryavtseva

quote: I'm thrilled, I'm grateful, I'm blessed. I played for the world's greatest professional sports team in history. Once a Dallas Cowboy, always a Dallas Cowboy.
author: Bob Hayes

quote: What drives me now is the fact that I feel like I still have so many tricks that I want to learn and so many things that I can still do. And so many cool things outside of sports that I have been doing.
author: Shaun White

quote: For truly it is to be noted, that children's plays are not sports, and should be deemed as their most serious actions.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: I've told Billy if I ever caught him cheating, I wouldn't kill him because I love his children and they need a dad. But I would beat him up. I know where all of his sports injuries are.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: I never in my wildest imagination dreamed that I would somehow become a sports commentator.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: Restaurants and chefs have become followed by such a broad swath of the public, in a way that used to be reserved for sports stars, movie stars, and theater actors. Restaurants are in the firmament of today's common culture.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: If you got the game, you got the game. That's why Tiger Woods is out there playing golf with Greg Norman.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: I started modeling when I was about 2 or 3 years old; I started with Baby Guess, and I did Guess Kids, and that was the extent of my modeling career as a kid. I took all of my elementary, middle and high school years off to focus on school and sports.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: Amateurism is the strongest form of discrimination in sports. Because it discriminates against the underprivileged, it discriminates against the poor. If we want sports to go back to the wealthy, let's make it amateur again.
author: Carl Lewis

quote: It's our responsibility for the village to say, 'Hey we're going to create these programs,' whether it's sports, creative arts, music, we need some things to give young people positive things to do, and that's including jobs.
author: Common

quote: I photographed all kinds of sports - Formula 1, Formula Atlantic. And anybody who knows me knows that, from the day they invented video cameras, I used to lug them around when you had to carry the pack here and the big camera here, plus the diaper bag and a baby and the purse or whatever.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: My greatest gift in life was being dyslexic. It made me special. It made me different. If I had not been dyslexic, I wouldn't have needed sports.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: I'm sort of like a lame, single guy in a red sports car.
author: Billy Corgan

quote: I myself am frustrated in just where sports are at. It's a hard thing when you're out there working every day, and you know that someone else is cheating and they may not necessarily get caught.
author: Allyson Felix

quote: My love for sports will never die. I love martial arts and I want to promote it in whichever way I can. I am a fighter first, then an actor.
author: Akshay Kumar

quote: One thing you learned as a Cubs fan: when you bought you ticket, you could bank on seeing the bottom of the ninth.
author: Joe Garagiola

quote: The crowd makes the ballgame.
author: Ty Cobb

quote: I think it's huge, especially in team sports, for players to be able to rely on each other and to really trust in each other.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: I rarely felt or noticed any real divide between girls and boys when I was growing up. Maybe it was because I was so involved in sports and competed with the boys. Maybe it was my mom and dad, who constantly instilled confidence in me and never made me feel as though there were boy activities and girl activities.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: I'm from a very athletic family, and I thoroughly enjoyed sports as a kid, but acting was a way of expressing myself and having fun. It was something I found on my own.
author: Matt Bomer

quote: I'm a competitive person and I love the challenge of mastering new things.
author: Sasha Cohen

quote: Predominantly I'm an Adidas guy who walks around in sports gear all the time because there's always a ball right next to me somewhere. I do a lot of sports, but I do enjoy wearing a lot of suits.
author: Mads Mikkelsen

quote: My concentration level blocks out everything. Concentration is why some athletes are better than others. You develop that concentration in training and concentrate in a meet.
author: Edwin Moses

quote: When my TV show, 'Sports Jobs with Junior Seau,' assigned me to be a 'Sports Illustrated' reporter for a weekend, I didn't realize I'd have to squeeze it in around another sports job. I had planned to retire from the NFL to enjoy the cushy lifestyle of a full-time reality TV star, but I wound up getting run over by a bull.
author: Junior Seau

quote: I have my parents to thank for that, they raised me to be active and play all sports. They taught me the importance of staying healthy, being focused and setting goals in whatever I do.
author: Kiana Tom

quote: My whole life I've actually been training to be a stunt man without realising it. I've always loved extreme sports, and I now I get paid for it.
author: Steve Truglia

quote: Jamaica is more than just the 'brand' the world recognizes so well; it's a place of pride for the people who live here, its educational institutions, its sports achievements, its science and technology growth.
author: Portia Simpson-Miller

quote: In order to stay healthy, recover quickly, and continue building strength and agility, I've combined different types of low-impact sports circuit exercises to maximize and expand my abilities.
author: Rob Gronkowski

quote: I was very fortunate to play sports. All the anger in me went out. I had to do what I had to do. If you stay angry all the time, then you really don't have a good life.
author: Willie Mays

quote: I played sports year around: basketball, soccer, softball and I ran track year around, from the time I was, like, six, seven.
author: Gabrielle Union

quote: I was into basketball, but then once I found contact sports, it was over. I never played basketball again in my life.
author: Daniel Cormier

quote: You don't play against opponents, you play against the game of basketball.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: All hockey players are bilingual. They know English and profanity.
author: Gordie Howe

quote: Half the lies they tell about me aren't true.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: I think badminton has a real legacy with more youngsters taking up the sport. Badminton has done really well in that regard compared to other sports.
author: Rajiv Ouseph

quote: Golf is a good walk spoiled.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The world of sports knows no religious, racial or political differences. Athletes, from whatever land they come, speak the same language. The lessons of competition are lessons for life.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: We wanted Nike to be the world's best sports and fitness company. Once you say that, you have a focus. You don't end up making wing tips or sponsoring the next Rolling Stones world tour.
author: Phil Knight

quote: I've never met anybody who says they don't like the World Cup. If you're a soccer fan or not, everybody loves watching it, and I think it could be the same for other sports.
author: Landon Donovan

quote: Sports is the toy department of human life.
author: Howard Cosell

quote: I have to confess I'm addicted to Sky Sports News. Just the music can pull me in. And then whether it's badminton in the Czech Republic, snail pushing or mole hopping, I'm hooked.
author: Andrew Buchan

quote: In the summer of 1963, my second with 'Sports Illustrated,' Jerry Tax, the basketball editor, got the Celtics' Frank Ramsey, the NBA's first famous sixth man, to do a piece for the magazine revealing some of the devious little tricks of his trade. Things like surreptitiously holding an opponent's shorts - nickel-and-dime stuff.
author: Frank Deford

quote: As you become a legend in the game, you build more doubters than you build supporters. And that's fine. I think that comes with anything that's challenging. I think it even comes with sports. The older that Michael Jordan got, I think the more doubted he became.
author: Nelly

quote: The word 'geek' today does not mean what it used to mean. A geek isn't the skinny kid with a pocket protector and acne. There can be computer geeks, video game geeks, car geeks, military geeks, and sports geeks. Being a geek just means that you're passionate about something.
author: Olivia Munn

quote: Regardless of the obstacles or hurdles that are ahead of you, regardless of the opponent, regardless of the odds, your goal and objective always is to win. I think that's part of sports.
author: Grant Hill

quote: You've got to enjoy time with your family and friends, and if you're involved in sports franchises, those peak moments in playoff games. You have to enjoy life.
author: Paul Allen

quote: My first obsession was actually sports. I was a very good handball goalkeeper. With special permission, I played in the premier league in Germany before I was even old enough.
author: Peter Lindbergh

quote: The difference between the old ballplayer and the new ballplayer is the jersey. The old ballplayer cared about the name on the front. The new ballplayer cares about the name on the back.
author: Steve Garvey

quote: I regard golf as an expensive way of playing marbles.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Museums are like sports stadiums, hotels and hospitals: they are in the category of captive-audience dining.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: These are my new shoes. They're good shoes. They won't make you rich like me, they won't make you rebound like me, they definitely won't make you handsome like me. They'll only make you have shoes like me. That's it.
author: Charles Barkley

quote: All of the sports have a safety net, but boxing is the only sport that has none. So when the fighter is through, he is through. While he was fighting his management was very excited for him, but now that he is done, that management team is moving on.
author: Gerry Cooney

quote: The great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, putting forward the development of sports as a matter that has an important bearing on the prosperity of the country and nation, indicated the road ahead of the Juche-based sports and wrote a new chapter in the history of building a sports power by dint of outstanding ideas and leadership.
author: Kim Jong-un

quote: First of all the name, and the color purple, I think those two things distinguish the Vikings as much as anything. You go anywhere in the country and say 'Vikings,' they know exactly where you are. You say 'Cardinals,' well, Cardinals who? There are a dozen Cardinals teams in the country in professional and amateur sports.
author: Bud Grant

quote: Football is violence and cold weather and sex and college rye.
author: Roger Kahn

quote: Nobody wants to buy a $60,000 electric Civic. But people will pay $90,000 for an electric sports car.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Above all, such sports as judo, in my view, teach people to relate to each other. They teach us to respect a partner, teach us to understand that an externally weak partner can not only put up worthy resistance, but, if you relax and take too much for granted, may even win.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: I think that from the time you start playing sports as a child you see that your responsibility to your team is to play the best that you can play as an individual... and yet, not take anything away from being part of a team.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Thank you... fantasy football draft, for letting me know that even in my fantasies, I am bad at sports.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: Sports uplift us. It's celebratory, gives us optimism and joy.
author: Travis Kalanick

quote: My father was an athlete, a great athlete, fought in the Marines in World War I. He was all sports and activity. My mother was all academics. I still have the complete works of Shakespeare that she had.
author: Marv Levy

quote: I get very envious of my general news colleagues who are always being handed sexy new stuff like global warming, China, and Donald Trump, while my sports colleagues and I must be eternally satisfied with the same old home-court advantage, soccer, and momentum.
author: Frank Deford

quote: The importance that our society attaches to sport is incredible. After all, is football a game or a religion? The people of this country have allowed sports to get completely out of hand.
author: Howard Cosell

quote: Reverse every natural instinct and do the opposite of what you are inclined to do, and you will probably come very close to having a perfect golf swing.
author: Ben Hogan

quote: The uglier a man's legs are, the better he plays golf - it's almost a law.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: All sports for all people.
author: Pierre de Coubertin

quote: I'm a visual thinker, really bad at algebra. There's others that are a pattern thinker. These are the music and math minds. They think in patterns instead of pictures. Then there's another type that's not a visual thinker at all, and they're the ones that memorize all of the sports statistics, all of the weather statistics.
author: Temple Grandin

quote: Boxing is a celebration of the lost religion of masculinity all the more trenchant for its being lost.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: I never really participated in specific sports or anything, but once I hit 40, I started to get a little bit more active and began swimming more.
author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quote: Approach the game with no preset agendas and you'll probably come away surprised at your overall efforts.
author: Phil Jackson

quote: When we had segregated schools and when we had a time when, you know, girls weren't allowed to have the same kind of sports teams - I mean, there have been important inflection points for the federal government to get involved in some of the areas around protecting students and ensuring safe environments for them - there is a role to play.
author: Betsy DeVos

quote: The great thing coming from sports is you understand the concept of a team. It leaves no room for being selfish, and that's something I picked up from home.
author: Michael Strahan

quote: It takes a tremendous amount of skill to be a football player. And some of these guys have enough skills to do other sports. Soccer could be one. Basketball could be another. Things where you need incredible hand-eye coordination are always options. I think a football player would be able to adapt to a lot of sports.
author: Troy Polamalu

quote: There are kids who get on a BMX bike when they're eight years old and they go, 'Whoa, this is incredible,' and grow up to do extreme sports. It's the same for me with acting.
author: Joaquin Phoenix

quote: The day after high school, I was off to basic training at the Great Lakes Naval Station. You gotta understand, we didn't care about sports. We wanted to win the war. We wanted to win the war! And at the time, we didn't know if we would.
author: Bud Grant

quote: It's not just the kid who's spent every penny from his job to upgrade his car to tell the world he cares about sports cars, it's also the person driving around in a fuel-conscious hybrid electric car, because it's more a message to the world than an effective means of saving fuel, to be quite honest.
author: Richard Hammond

quote: Trying to sneak a fastball past Hank Aaron is like trying to sneak the sunrise past a rooster.
author: Joe Adcock

quote: Selling an electric sports car creates an opportunity to fundamentally change the way America drives.
author: Elon Musk

quote: When it comes to women, there has been a tendency to define women in sports in the context of their relationships - they watch games because their husbands watch. They're interested because their kids play a sport. They buy tickets to a sporting event because it's a way to spend time with family.
author: Indra Nooyi

quote: The American people are sheep. They're comfortable, rich, working. It's like the Romans, they're happy with bread and their spectator sports. The Super Bowl means more to them than any right.
author: Jack Kevorkian

quote: I remember my first 'Sports Illustrated' shoot was with the photographer Walter Iooss, and Julie Campbell was the editor, and we were at the president of Mexico's private house in Cancun - this was before anything else that's now in Cancun even existed. And they told me to get a tan, so I spent all morning in the sun, and I was burnt.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: I think as far as any kind of pressure on a football team or on an individual in professional sports really depends not only on that individual but the leadership they have on the team and the leadership they have on the coaching staff. A lot of times, they can divert some of those pressures off of the individual and off of the team.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Some anthems are great for sports. You've got the Russian national anthem... 'O Canada,' how wonderful is that for hockey... but I chose the Italian national song because at my first World Cup, I saw the Italians play four times, and they won all four times - they won the championship.
author: George Vecsey

quote: The trouble with jogging is that the ice falls out of your glass.
author: Martin Mull

quote: All sports must be treated on the basis of equality.
author: Pierre de Coubertin

quote: The fewer rules a coach has, the fewer rules there are for players to break.
author: John Madden

quote: You know it's going to hell when the best rapper out there is white and the best golfer is black.
author: Charles Barkley

quote: I sort of try to write everything for me. I'm a huge sports fan but have no interest in minutiae. I don't remember who won Super Bowls five years ago or listen to sports talk radio. I'm trying to make sure the jokes are self-contained so they're accessible to everyone.
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: Sports without music, it's nothing but a game. Music adds the emotion.
author: Ice Cube

quote: I want to explore the world properly, to be able to write about and take pictures of all kinds of different cultures. Just be an explorer or adventurer. I also love extreme sports.
author: Cara Delevingne

quote: Video games offer violent messages, and even the sports video games include taunting and teasing.
author: Geoffrey Canada

quote: That's the biggest problem with boxing in the United States. They do not promote it like they used to, when it used to be Howard Cosell and they showed it on 'Wide World of Sports.' Everybody knew all the fighters. Everybody was looking forward to the year when the Olympics came on.
author: Evander Holyfield

quote: Quickness and momentum. You take the whole last generation of sports, listening to them, even reading about them, watching the games, analyzing them, arguing about them, instant-replaying them, second-guessing them, and all you'll distill from them is quickness and momentum.
author: Frank Deford

quote: In recent generations, women's sports have been a blessing. Some of us can remember the bad old days in the '50s, when we would discover in casual schoolyard play that a girl could outrun most of us or hold her own in basketball or hit a softball - but there were no teams, no coaches, for girls.
author: George Vecsey

quote: I am a sports enthusiast, and if given an opportunity, I want to be a sportsman, even today. I want to promote the sport that is indigenous to India. Kabaddi is a matter of national pride. Why can't cricket, hockey, football and kabaddi be given equal platforms and co-exist? I believe that can happen.
author: Abhishek Bachchan

quote: The only thing a golfer needs is more daylight.
author: Ben Hogan

quote: The biggest lesson from Africa was that life's joys come mostly from relationships and friendships, not from material things. I saw time and again how much fun Africans had with their families and friends and on the sports fields; they laughed all the time.
author: Andrew Shue

quote: It took me a few years to explain to my colleagues and my mentors and the people that I looked up to and I wrestled that I'm not in wrestling anymore. I'm in sports entertainment. Pro' wrestling doesn't mean that we're saying we're a step up above amateur wrestling, because there's nothing above Olympic wrestling.
author: Kurt Angle

quote: I love kids, outings, camping, sports, Legoland, all the Daddy stuff. I love it. I wish I could just do that, but I have to work, too.
author: Mekhi Phifer

quote: I've used my experience from playing sports in almost every aspect of my life. Playing soccer is where I found my voice, and playing softball was where I learned precision, and in every game I learned to play as a member of a team - to work not for my own glory, but for a shared goal.
author: Linda Sanchez

quote: I did a shoot for 'Sports Illustrated,' and my grandpa called me and asked when my issue of 'Playboy' was coming out. It was hilarious as well as embarrassing.
author: Jasmine Tookes

quote: Economics is about creating win-win situations. But in sports, someone loses.
author: Stan Kroenke

quote: When launching a product called an Energy Drink and named Red Bull, a product that stimulates body and mind, it is a short step to the roots where Red Bull came from. We have been doing this for 20 years - now it's called adventure sports, extreme sports, and outdoor sports.
author: Dietrich Mateschitz

quote: I won't have any competitive instincts in any sports, other than golf. I can't see being competitive in sports any more.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I hate all sports as rabidly as a person who likes sports hates common sense.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: When did I know I had talent? I think it started when I first started playing sports, organized sports.
author: LeBron James

quote: Owning a popular sports team is very different than any other type of business. They don't throw parades when Apple has the biggest quarter in corporate history. People don't call and email asking for anyone from the team to come visit their sick child. They don't cry as they request a jersey of their child's favorite player to be buried with them.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: I think extreme sports are really good for relieving stress.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: Even from their infancy we frame them to the sports of love: their instruction, behavior, attire, grace, learning and all their words azimuth only at love, respects only affection. Their nurses and their keepers imprint no other thing in them.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Unfortunately the world is what it is now. People don't get along for whatever reason. As professional athletes, in a way we're almost ambassadors for peace, because sports brings everyone together.
author: Venus Williams

quote: Trip Hawkins - and this was the early 1980s - was saying there's going to be a day when everyone has a computer and they're going to want to do more on it, including playing games. So he started up a company, EA Sports, and he was going to have three games, football, basketball and baseball. So I was the football game.
author: John Madden

quote: To be honest, I'm shocked the University of Washington's sports teams are called the Huskies. Why haven't the Leftists that run this entire state demanded they be renamed the 'Athletes of Size' so as to not fat shame anyone?
author: Milo Yiannopoulos

quote: Loyalty and communication are always rewarded in sports.
author: Cheech Marin

quote: Whatever free time I get, I love to catch news and sports shows.
author: Amitabh Bachchan

quote: Perhaps the single most important element in mastering the techniques and tactics of racing is experience. But once you have the fundamentals, acquiring the experience is a matter of time.
author: Greg LeMond

quote: Sport is a wonderful metaphor for life. Of all the sports that I played - skiing, baseball, fishing - there is no greater example than golf, because you're playing against yourself and nature.
author: Robert Redford

quote: We're going to have more kids playing, and we're going to have a better chance of finding those players Minor sports in a community is for fun and recreation. For everyone.
author: Bobby Orr

quote: If you drink don't drive. Don't even putt.
author: Dean Martin

quote: I wanted to perform well for my mom and dad, because in high school, I didn't have a job. My brothers, they worked at Pizza Hut or places like that, but sports, that was my way of giving back.
author: Junior Seau

quote: The addiction to sports, therefore, in a peculiar degree marks an arrested development in man's moral nature.
author: Thorstein Veblen

quote: Unless you enjoy life passionately, you cannot be a good artiste. Practise what you like, be it sports or dancing.
author: Sarita Choudhury

quote: Politics is comparable to boxing. The only thing is that in politics there are basically no rules. In boxing, you can get a black eye, but in politics you can get poison in your food or a bullet in the head. It's definitely rougher and tougher than other sports.
author: Wladimir Klitschko

quote: I think it is easier for thinner people to build on a frame once you get lean muscle. I get bored lifting weights at the gym, and it isn't enough as your body becomes stiff. So I train in different ways such as core training, cardio with weights, playing sports such as tennis, cycling, swimming and running 10 km once a week.
author: Arjun Rampal

quote: When a sports movie really works, it gets you on all levels, because the stakes are high. It's black and white. It's win or lose.
author: Carla Gugino

quote: I used to practice at the hockey ground on synthetic surface while I was in the sports hostel, so Test cricket is certainly going to be a challenge for me.
author: Suresh Raina

quote: I know my strengths. Painfully aware of the weaknesses. There's many. I love sports. So working towards a common goal, that's exciting to me.
author: Kathy Ireland

quote: In America, we have three major sports - baseball, football and basketball. They get the most coverage. Then there's things like golf which mop up most of what is left. But track and field? We are way at the bottom of the totem pole.
author: Maurice Greene

quote: In sports, every day you can be the hero or the goat.
author: Geoff Stults

quote: Leadership is one of sports' intangibles. Guys can score, guys can fight, guys can skate faster than anybody else. But not everybody can say, 'Follow me.'
author: Paul Coffey

quote: I started wrestling at ten. I played a lot of other sports: soccer, football. I really enjoyed skiing. But wrestling just took off for me. It seemed to be the sport I had an affinity for; I liked the individual, combative nature. There's something special about that. It took me all the places I wanted to go.
author: Randy Couture

quote: I know when I have kids, when I'm older, I'm going to encourage them to play sports because I think it teaches you a lot. It teaches you discipline, teamwork, and that there's really no 'I' in team.
author: Gregg Sulkin

quote: A rabid sports fan is one that boos a TV set.
author: Jimmy Cannon

quote: I can't say this enough - the food that you put into your bodies can actually help you get better grades. And it can also affect your performance in sports and other activities too. You see, when you give your body the best possible fuel, you have more energy, you're stronger, you think more quickly.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: As athletes, we're used to reacting quickly. Here, it's 'come, stop, come, stop.' There's a lot of downtime. That's the toughest part of the day.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The game of golf would lose a great deal if croquet mallets and billiard cues were allowed on the putting green.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The best thing about the Kentucky Derby is that it is only two minutes long. It is the quickest event in sports, except for Sumo-wrestling & Mike Tyson fights. Maybe Drag-racing is quicker, but I have never been attracted to it.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Thus so wretched is man that he would weary even without any cause for weariness... and so frivolous is he that, though full of a thousand reasons for weariness, the least thing, such as playing billiards or hitting a ball, is sufficient enough to amuse him.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: If a man watches three football games in a row, he should be declared legally dead.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: It was easy being healthy when I was young. I was full of energy, so sports and physical challenges were fun. But as I got older and the spring left my step, exercise became harder, and eating, drinking and watching TV became easier. By the time I was 50, I'd put on 50 pounds.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: We knew sports was important to us and our family, but there are priorities in life.Obviously, faith is foremost; how we did in school is important. If we didn't handle that business then there were no privileges.
author: Stephen Curry

quote: In the sports arena I would say there is nothing like training and preparation. You have to train your mind as much as your body.
author: Venus Williams

quote: There is no life for girls in team sports past Little League. I got into tennis when I realized this, and because I thought golf would be too slow for me, and I was too scared to swim.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: I'm a pretty agile guy, especially being taller and having done martial arts from about the age of 13, but parkour is one of those sports that I wish I'd discovered sooner. When my nephew first showed me, I thought, 'Damn - I'm too old for this.'
author: Paul Walker

quote: I know I could be the host of 'SportsCenter' in two years if I changed my show today to sports.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: It's a round ball and a round bat, and you got to hit it square.
author: Pete Rose

quote: I did all the right things in so many tournaments. But like I said, sometimes in sports it just goes the other way. Maybe you've already won so much that it evens it out a bit sometimes. I don't know.
author: Roger Federer

quote: I'm actually a fan of all of the EA Sports titles like 'Tiger Woods,' 'Madden,' and I'm really looking forward to buying 'NBA Street V3.'
author: John Cena

quote: I like to follow my favorite team and talk sports with my band or fans. You won't believe how many musicians are sports fans. We have so much time on tour that we need these outlets for relaxation.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: I like the order and simplicity of sports. They have an ending. You can argue with your friends about it, but in the end, you still like sports. I almost love the fantasy world of sports more than the real world.
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: Music has done a lot to enhance the emotions of sports. It's played in arenas. Whenever there is footage cut together they're always using music. And it goes together, you know.
author: Ice Cube

quote: I had pro offers from the Detroit Lions and Green Bay Packers, who were pretty hard up for linemen in those days. If I had gone into professional football the name Jerry Ford might have been a household word today.
author: Gerald R. Ford

quote: I've been a sports fan all my life, and like most other actors, I'm convinced I could have been a pro athlete if Hollywood hadn't come calling.
author: Jamie Foxx

quote: The growth of women's soccer and women's sports all around the world has been slow.
author: Abby Wambach

quote: I'm 19 now, and I go to The New School in New York, where I study Criminal Psychology. My first week of second semester was during Fashion Week when my first editorials in 'CR Fashion Book' and 'Sports Illustrated' came out. It was crazy!
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: In a world as competitive as ours, the child who does not get a decent education is condemned to the fringes of society. I think all Australians agree that this is intolerable. So we must demand as much of our schools as we do of our sports teams - and ensure that they keep the Australian dream alive for every child.
author: Rupert Murdoch

quote: Sports is like rock 'n' roll. Both are dominant cultural forces, both speak an international language, and both are all about emotions.
author: Phil Knight

quote: I liked the game, I enjoyed the game, and the game fed me enough, and gave me enough rewards to reinforce that this is something that I should spend time doing, and that I could possibly make a priority in my life, versus other sports.
author: Julius Erving

quote: What separates sports from entrepreneurism, however, is that in business we constantly have to overcome undefined and unpredictable challenges. Athletes train for specific events and conditions, whereas entrepreneurs generally have little idea what they will encounter along the way.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: For many sports fans, the onset of fall only means one thing: It's football season!
author: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: We live in a social world now, and there's no denying the power that Twitter has yielded across all verticals. Sports is a perfect fit because fans are highly emotionally charged and things happen quick.
author: Amy Jo Martin

quote: Fans don't boo nobodies.
author: Reggie Jackson

quote: I got into sports because that was a way to prove your masculinity. I was good at it.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: I can tell you, I grew up with great coaching, and it had nothing to do with sports. I had great parents. I really got some great input from there. They were entrepreneurial, middle-class business people.
author: Jerry Jones

quote: I feel that schools and corporates should help the government in popularising sports in the country. Blaming the government for every sporting debacle will not be fair.
author: Viswanathan Anand

quote: If you don't eat right as an athlete, you'll get tired and won't be as sharp. It's simple to drink sodas and sports drinks, but water is the most essential drink to put in your body.
author: Troy Polamalu

quote: Sports, entertainment and aviation are three of the most exciting professions in the world; you are dealing with the same magnitude.
author: John Travolta

quote: As a result of Title IX, and a new generation of parents who want their daughters to have the opportunities they never had, women's sports have arrived.
author: Sheryl Swoopes

quote: You don't hurt 'em if you don't hit 'em.
author: Chesty Puller

quote: Every great batter works on the theory that the pitcher is more afraid of him than he is of the pitcher.
author: Ty Cobb

quote: I think that every single person should play sports.
author: Donovan Bailey

quote: The thing about ballet that I never knew about is that it's one of the most excruciating sports that I've ever been a part of. I say sports because they train constantly, every single day.
author: Mila Kunis

quote: Even in the most peaceful communities, an appetite for violence shows up in dreams, fantasies, sports, play, literature, movies and television. And, so long as we don't transform into angels, violence and the threat of violence - as in punishment and deterrence - is needed to rein in our worst instincts.
author: Paul Bloom

quote: I can talk about sports and stuff, but I have a season pass for 'Antiques Roadshow' on my TiVo.
author: Paul Rudd

quote: Pittsburgh felt like the perfect size of a city to me. There's enough to do, but it's not like living in a circus. I also really loved how sports-enthusiastic Pittsburgh people are: how proud of their sports they are.
author: Joel Edgerton

quote: Our philosophy is you need to give nonprofit money for health, nutrition, education, culture, and sports.
author: Carlos Slim

quote: I did everything when I started. In Miami I did news, I did weather, I did sports, I did disk-jockeying. And I did a sports talk show every week - every Saturday night.
author: Larry King
